parameters.name: ClassicExpiredDays
parameters.description: The retention days of the classic network endpoint. Valid values: **1 to 120**. Unit: days.

parameters.name: ConnectionString
parameters.description:
The classic network endpoint whose expiration time you want to extend. Two types of classic network endpoints are supported:

*   The internal endpoint of the classic network.
*   The read/write splitting endpoint of the classic network.

parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID. You can call the DescribeDBInstances operation to query the instance ID.
